chunk_prompt: Summarize the following discussion about career job interview into 2-3 clear, complete sentences:
final_prompt: Create a coherent 2-3 sentence summary about career job interview. Focus on the most important information and ensure it flows well:

sentences.text: Update your LinkedIn immediately and set to "open to work" - I got 3 interviews just from that.
I regularly place people in their 40s and 50s in new career paths.
The key was staying structured in my approach and treating the job search like a job itself.
I (35M) just got laid off from my job as a marketing manager at a mid-sized tech company after 5 years.
Use AI to your advantage - use ChatGPT to help update your resume and craft compelling cover letters.

chunks.raw_summary: The key was staying structured in my approach and treating the job search like a job itself . Update your LinkedIn immediately and set to "open to work" - I got 3 interviews just from that . Use ChatGPT to help update your resume and craft compelling cover letters .
